DOC.brief_summary: Kinetics of Copeptin in response to osmotic alterations in healthy volunteers
DOC.brief_title: Copeptin in Normal- to Hyperosmolar States
DOC.detailed_description: Construction of the standard area of copeptin release in the normo- and hyperosmolar state and its half-life based on ist decline during hypoosmotic Suppression in healthy volunteers.
DOC.criteria: Minimum Age 18 no severe comorbidities no medication (except contraceptives) baseline sodium Level 135145mmol/l euvolemic status history of heart failure liver cirrhosis kidney disease (GFR <60ml/min) anemia uncontrolled Hypertension pregnancy Diabetes mellitus BMI >28kg/m2 other severe disease
